name: Unreal Incidents :Chapter 1
description:
You are Autumn, A girl who got stuck in a haunted house because of some silly challenge of your friends. Make your way through the haunted house uncovering the  mysterious that surround the house.

There are three different endings so try your best to get the best one.

Controls

A-D -to move

Spacebar-jump

W-Use weapon

E-To Interact
